âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Simultaneously prompt multiple LLMs â€¢ Supports ChatGPT, Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, X.ai Grok, DeepSeek, and Copilot â€¢ Paste text or screenshots directly into the prompt area
ðŸ“– Summary: LLM-God is a desktop application for Windows that allows users to simultaneously prompt multiple large language models (LLMs) like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude from a single interface. It aims to streamline workflows by eliminating the need to copy-paste between different LLM web interfaces, saving time for both coding and non-coding tasks.
